Grade: 95

Comment: This response provides a detailed and comprehensive explanation of the significance of the title "King of the Jews" in relation to Jesus' identity as the Messiah. It effectively addresses the concern by emphasizing Jesus' messianic role as the promised descendant of King David and the eternal nature of His reign. The response skillfully integrates biblical references and theological insights to support the interpretation within a Christian worldview. It demonstrates a thorough understanding of the central importance of Jesus' messianic role in Christian faith.
